newsitem.title: USA: Iowa-S Minn fed cattle trade steady, light - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Iowa-S Minn fed cattle trade steady, light - USDA.

text.p: were steady on a live basis, compared with Tuesday's close,
USDA said. Trade was light to moderate. Demand and seller
interest light to moderate. Offerings continue current.
Confirmed Sales: 2,800 Week Ago: 17,300 Year Ago: 10,300
Week to Date: 17,400 Week Ago: 24,100 Year Ago: 36,600
Steers: Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1150-1300 lb 64.00-65.00 Heifers: Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1100-1200 lb 63.00-64.50
Carcass basis (weight only), compared with Tuesday's
close, slaughter steers and heifers were steady.
Steers: Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1150-1300 lb
Holstein: (weight only) Select to mostly Choice 2-3 1250-1400
Heifers: Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1100-1200 lbs
